name: Insecurities
description:
A tale of two characters with insecurities, who love each other.

Them being blind to their partner's downsides, makes them stronger as a team.

Hey guys, That's my first game jam entry. Actually I started learning game development in Unity a few months ago, and that's my first game that I create by myself (with no guides or tutorials).

Any comment, tip, criticism or suggestion are welcome - 

All art was made by me in Photoshop, 

All code was written by me.

All the sound effects and music were made by me in Audacity (Recordings) and Bfxr.

So if you have anything to say regarding any subject related to this game, please do post so I could keep improving.

That's all, hope you enjoy!

CONTROLS: 

Arrow keys - move

Q-hit

W-Switch

E-jump

*Update: Updated the WebGL version with controls as people didn't know what to do at the start of the game.
